name: Grav
description: Modern, Crazy Fast, Ridiculously Easy and Amazingly Powerful Flat-File CMS

scripts.post-create: rm -rf ~/code/public_html && cd ~/code/grav && bin/grav install && cd ~/code && mv grav public_html && sudo chown -R nitrous:www-data public_html && sudo chmod -R g+w public_html && sudo a2enmod rewrite && sudo service apache2 restart
